rules_text:
Restart the game, leaving in exile all cards in exile. Exile this spell.
Cycling {W} [i]({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)[/i]
When you cycle this card, exile it. You may cast it this game as long as it is exiled.
flavor_text:
[i]Now open your eyes while our plight is repeated.
Still deaf to our cries, lost in hope we lie defeated.[/i]
